channel.title: Need some help on a few things on my server
channel.description:
Now, I have made a server, pimpscape as my source. I want to change everything so don't say I'm a leecher... and save your flaming for somewhere else... I want to know: :confused:
1. How to make myself owner, I know where to find it, but I just need to know the RIGHT's Value #'s (1-3).
2. How to make NPCs talk.
3. How to edit existing shops, again I didn't leech this I want to change pretty much everything in the server.
4. How to make a wild (or unsafe) area; a safe area.
5. How to make a new starting area, and starting outfit.
6. How to change the emote teleports.
7. How to change how much exp you get per hit kinda thing.
I know this is all probably all newby stuff. but hey I'm a noob at this. :P But anyways thanks for aleast lookin', and anyone one of these to be answered would be greatly appreciated! :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :)

item.description:
@gabimo wrote:

on number 6 look at texthandler.java to edit what the tabs actually SAY

from nod, to kbd or whateveryou’re doing

to change whta it does in client.java look for
case # of emote tab as “case #:”

and edit whats beneath it
add a teleblock then a command that you made earlier

item.title: Need some help on a few things on my server
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

  1. How to make myself owner, I know where to find it, but I just need to know the RIGHT’s Value #'s (1-3).
    0=player
    1=mod
    2=admin
    3=owner
    4=hidden admin

  2. How to make NPCs talk.
    npchandler.java

  3. How to edit existing shops, again I didn’t leech this I want to change pretty much everything in the server.
    shops.cfg

  4. How to make a wild (or unsafe) area; a safe area.
    nonwild boolean

  5. How to make a new starting area, and starting outfit.
    starting oufit=player.java starting place=change cord’s in player.java and client.java

  6. How to change the emote teleports.
    unno

  7. How to change how much exp you get per hit kinda thing.
    search your current xp rate.
    [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2008, 08:38:28 pm[/size][hr][quote=“axlnosbest1, post:7, topic:246834”]Another question lol

Can anyone provide me with a link or download for an npc id list on notepad or sumthing[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2008, 08:31:09 pm[/size][hr]bump and another thing, how do I change the text that comes on when I go online, at the text screen at the bottom[/quote]

moparscapes webclient has a npc list.
search the text in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help on a few things on my server
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

right click on it, and click Open With… and then click Notepad.

Just please be careful and back it up since I can tell you are new, messing up one tab in there will error your whole server, without the compiler showing it.

item.source: Need some help on a few things on my server

item.title: Need some help on a few things on my server
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

  1. How to make myself owner, I know where to find it, but I just need to know the RIGHT’s Value #'s (1-3).
    A: 3

  2. How to make NPCs talk.
    A: NPCHandler.java

  3. How to edit existing shops, again I didn’t leech this I want to change pretty much everything in the server.
    A: shops.cfg, if you are going to edit them, MAKE SURE YOU USE TABS, NOT SPACES!

  4. How to make a wild (or unsafe) area; a safe area.
    A: Google it, it should bring up a guide. But it is all in public boolean nonWild()

  5. How to make a new starting area, and starting outfit.
    A: client.java for new area, player.java for look. For the look search for

 //giving the player a unique look

  1. How to change the emote teleports.
    A: client.java

  2. How to change how much exp you get per hit kinda thing.

find out how much xp you get for 1 damage now. If it was 40, then search for in client.java

40 * hitDiff

Change the 40 for all of the codes around that.

Sorry I didnt explain all that much, I am busy on another forum.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help on a few things on my server
